[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/autodoc/autodoc_nroff.c

This creates an nroff document from the generated automatic documentation. It also writes out the single file descriptions for the methods with documentation attached.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Tue Oct 28 11:39:47 EST 1997

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/autodoc.h

Method index

convert_html(string, int, int, int)
Converts the html tags into nroff format.
create_nroff_file(object, string)
Writes the data from the autodoc file object out to a file in nroff format.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
convert_html
string convert_html(string text,
int depth,
int preformat,
int edge_width)
Converts the html tags into nroff format...

Parameters:
text - the text to convert
depth - the current depth we are at
preformat - is this text preformated?
edge_width - the width to use as a buffer on the edge
Returns:
a nroff format file string
create_nroff_file
void create_nroff_file(object file,
string output)
Writes the data from the autodoc file object out to a file in nroff format.

Parameters:
file - the autodoc file object
output - the output file to write to
See also:
